handle: The First Noel A Tale of Friendship Hardcover
body:
***What happens when a friendship develops between the daughter***

***of a rich Wiseman and a common shepherd girl*?**



**This Christmas poem weaves the heartwarming fictional journey of an unlikely friendship into the traditional Biblical account of Jesus' birth and tells how the arrival of the Savior challenges the heart of one girl to choose love over the acceptable social norm of her day, in a culture marked by rigid distinctions between social classes. Through this story children will learn to value diversity, acceptance, and love for others regardless of their social status.**



**Based on a ballet production, whimsical drawings will captivate readers and bring a charming twist to a classic Christmas story. Parents and children alike will love the lessons on friendship received through this delightful tale.**



**This edition: hardcover 11.02 x 0.25 x 8.5 inches**



**Also available in softcover 11.00" x 8.5" and softcover 8.25" x 0.09" x 6", in addition to The First Noel coloring Book!**
